name: John Killmen
description:
John was captured and John was sent to jail. But John has a plan.

Kill Men.

John Killmen is a short game made for Disc Jam where you play as a saw blade going on a rampage as it tries to escape from jail.

The game features:

31 randomized items

20 random room patterns

Like 5 minutes of gameplay.

Very shitty stop-motion cutscenes

Move with arrows and shoot with space.

You need Gamemaker 2 to open source files.

1.01 Fixed missing friend's name from credits. Sorry Froge.
